message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can work out a better deal in later rounds if you're willing to negotiate.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 50/50 is a good starting point. What do you think?
I'm willing to meet you halfway.  Let's split it 75/25. This gives you a larger share than the first round, and we can work our way up to a more equal split in the future if you're agreeable.
I'm not willing to give up too much at this point. I'll offer a slight compromise, but I'm holding firm on the 60/40 split.

I understand your position, Bob.  Let's try a 60/40 split. It's closer to your last offer, and it gives us both something to work with. We can move towards a more even split later if we both find it beneficial.
